servinfo.title: DTC P0160: O2 Sensor Circuit No Activity Detected (Sensor-2, Bank-2)

servinfosub.title: Wiring Diagram
servinfosub.ptxt: Refer to DTC P0157 / P0158: O2 Sensor Circuit Low Voltage / High Voltage (Sensor-2, Bank-2)

servinfosub.title: DTC Detecting Condition and Trouble Area

entry.ptxt: Circuit voltage of HO2S (bank-2) is within 0.27 V – 0.35 V for more than 120 sec. continuously while A/F (fuel trim) is shifted rich to lean and lean to rich with specified diagnosis frequency under specified running, or circuit voltage of HO2S (bank-2) is out of specified range (0.2 V – 0.45 V) while engine is running with warmed it up from cold start (ECT is less than 40 °C).

item.ptxt: When performing a road test, select a place where there is no traffic or possibility of a traffic accident and be very careful during testing to avoid occurrence of an accident.
Road test should be carried out by 2 persons, a driver and a tester, on a level road.

attention3.ptxt: Check to make sure that following conditions are satisfied when using this “DTC Confirmation Procedure”.

item.ptxt: Engine coolant temperature at engine start: –10 °C (14 °F) or more.
Atmospheric pressure: higher than 75 kPa (560 mmHg) (Altitude: lower than 2790 m (9150 ft)).
The following DTCs are not detected: MAF sensor, ECT sensor, IAT sensor, Fuel system, A/F sensor, TP sensor, HO2S sensor heater and HO2S sensor (other than DTC P0160).

s1.ptxt: With ignition switch turned OFF, connect scan tool.
Turn ON ignition switch and clear DTC using scan tool.
Start engine and warm up to normal operating temperature.
Drive vehicle at 40 mph (60 km/h) or higher. (engine speed: 2500 – 3000 r/min.)
Keep above vehicle speed for 4 min. or more. (Throttle valve opening is kept constant in this step.)

Check if DTC and pending DTC exist by using scan tool. If not, check if oxygen sensor monitoring test has been completed by using scan tool. If not in both of above checks (i.e., no DTC and pending DTC and oxygen sensor monitoring test not completed), check vehicle condition (environmental) and repeat Step 3) through 6).

attention3.ptxt: Before this trouble shooting is performed, read the precautions for DTC troubleshooting referring to Precautions for DTC Troubleshooting .

testgroup.question: Was “Engine and Emission Control System Check” performed?

action.ptxt: Go to Engine and Emission Control System Check .

testgroup.title: HO2S signal check

test1.ptxt: Connect scan tool with ignition switch turned OFF.
Warm up engine to normal operating temperature and keep it at 2000 r/min. for 60 sec.
Repeat racing engine (Repeat depressing accelerator pedal 5 to 6 times continuously to enrich A/F mixture and take foot off from pedal to enlean it).
Check for HO2S (bank-2) output voltage displayed on scan tool.

testgroup.question: Does HO2S output voltage between 0.5 V and 0.8 V?

paragroup.ptxt: Check for intermittent referring to Intermittent and Poor Connection Inspection .

test1.ptxt: Disconnect connectors from HO2S (bank-2) and ECM with ignition switch turned OFF.
Check for proper terminal connection to HO2S (bank-2) connector and ECM connector.
If connections are OK, check that HO2S (bank-2) circuit is as follows.

item.ptxt: Wiring harness resistance of each “Signal circuit of HO2S (bank-2)”, “Ground circuit of HO2S (bank-2)” and “Control circuit of HO2S (bank-2) heater” is less than 1 Ω.
Insulation resistance between “Signal circuit of HO2S (bank-2)” and vehicle body ground is infinity.
Insulation resistance of wire harness is infinity between “Signal circuit of HO2S (bank-2)” terminal and each other terminal at HO2S (bank-2) connector.
Circuit voltage between “Signal circuit of HO2S (bank-2)” and vehicle body ground is 0 V with ignition switch turned ON.

action.ptxt: Repair or replace defective wiring harness.

testgroup.title: HO2S heater check

test1.ptxt: Check heater resistance of HO2S (bank-2) referring to Heated Oxygen Sensor (HO2S-2) Heater On-Vehicle Inspection (If Equipped) .

testgroup.question: Is HO2S heater in good condition?

action.ptxt: Substitute a known good ECM and recheck. If ECM OK, replace HO2S (bank-2).
